title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Enhancing Self-Directed Social Problem-Solving Capabilities through Simulation-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Design and execute community problem-solving scenarios at least three times through role distribution among team members
Conduct at least two discussion sessions based on simulation results to derive improvement strategies
Establish socially applicable problem-solving strategies by achieving over 80% on summative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
